mapper.select: select od.o_d_no, od.order_no, od.o_d_product_count, p.* from order_detail od join product p on od.product_no = p.product_no where order_no = #{order_no}
select count(*) from order_detail od join product p on od.product_no = p.product_no where p.product_no = #{product_no} and od.order_no = #{order_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (o_d_no, order_no, o_d_product_count, product_no) VALUES (order_detail_o_d_no_SEQ.nextval, #{order_no}, #{product_count}, #{product_no})
mapper.delete: delete order_detail where order_no = #{order_no} and product_no = #{product_no}
